title: Probe under way into alleged sexual assault of child in Thane school
summary: Parents alleged, a person in blue clothes sexually assaulted their daughter in the school premises on July 30 between 11.15 am and 3 pm, the officials said.

title: Gas leak blast in Hyderabad’s Medchal market kills one, injures two
summary: Preliminary investigation revealed that a leak in the gas pipe had allowed gas to accumulate in the poorly ventilated space, leading to a blast when the stove was ignited.

title: Supreme Court likely to hear plea seeking restoration of statehood to J&K on August 8
summary: “The delay in the restoration of statehood would cause serious reduction of democratically elected government in Jammu and Kashmir, causing a grave violation of the idea of federalism which forms part of the basic structure of the Constitution of India,” the application said.

title: Customs officials bust smuggling racket, rescue 30 star tortoises at Bengaluru airport
summary: Sources said he had procured the consignment from Chikkaballapur, received them at Kalasipalya bus stand, before heading to the airport

title: Water tanker plunges into drain after road caves in at Hyderabad’s Banjara Hills
Mayawati denies alliance with BJP, says BSP to work independently
summary: Urging party workers and supporters to remain alert, Mayawati said such "dirty tactics" are part of political conspiracies aimed at weakening the Ambedkarite movement.

title: DRDO guest house manager held on suspicion of spying for Pakistan
summary: Mahendra Prasad, a resident of Uttarakhand's Almora, was posted as the manager of DRDO guest house in Chandan area of Jaisalmer

title: SWR operates special trains as indefinite RTC strike begins in Karnataka
summary: Additional train services have been arranged between key destinations on August 5 to help commuters affected by the absence of regular bus services

title: DHFL scam: SC cancels bail granted to Dheeraj Wadhawan, asks him to surrender in two weeks
summary: The order came on an appeal filed by the CBI appeal against the High Court order.

title: Negligence in desilting has delayed Cauvery water reaching tail-end areas in Tamil Nadu: Nainar Nagenthran
summary: In a statement, the BJP Tamil Nadu president said the Kuruvai paddy crop in Nagapattinam, Mayiladuthurai and Tiruvarur districts had started to wither due to the non-availability of adequate water for irrigation.

title: NDA passes resolution praising PM Modi, armed forces for Operation Sindoor, Operation Mahadev
summary: The Prime Minister also praised Home Minister Amit Shah and noted that he has become the longest-serving incumbent in the Ministry

title: Coal linkage recommended for development of Ennore Thermal Power Station expansion project
summary: The Central Electricity Authority (CEA) noted that the coal linkage for the project has been recommended based on the Resource Adequacy Plan accepted by Tamil Nadu.
